action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To prohibit officers and employees of the Internal Revenue Service from using personal email accounts to conduct official business.

section.header: IRS employees prohibited from using personal email accounts for official business
section.text: No officer or employee of the Internal Revenue Service may use a personal email account to conduct any official business of the Government.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives September 16, 2014.
